name: Legacy of Bossrush Kingdom
description:
Legacy of Bossrush Kingdom is a 15 minute long bossrush featuring characters from Touhou 15 Legacy of the Lunatic Kingdom with completely fanmade bullet hell patterns. I made it almost 2 years ago in the Danmakufu ph3 woo engine.

To start the bossrush open "th_dnh.exe" and simply select "All" and then either "Legacy of Bossrush Kingdom" option. You can also select any boss pattern individually to practice it.

You can change the resolution by editing the "th_dnh.def" file with any text editor (for example Notepad).  Please keep the resolution to 4:3 or else parts of the game might break. To enter fullscreen press Alt+Enter on your keyboard.

All graphics and music along with Touhou itself belong to ZUN. I'm sorry but I do not have the skill to make any assets on my own.
